title: Frigid River
description:
The River turns a corner here making it impossible to see the
Dam.  The White Cliffs loom on the east bank and large rocks prevent
landing on the west.

up.failureMessage: You can't go up from here.

east.failureMessage: You can't go east from here.

atmosphere: The air is cool and damp.
Water drips somewhere in the darkness.
Your footsteps echo off the stone walls.
